name: Winter Soldier

abilities.name: Precision Rifle
abilities.details: Fires accurate shots from his custom rifle. Can scope for increased precision and damage (ADS).

abilities.name: Underslung Grenade
abilities.details: Launches an explosive grenade from his rifle's attachment, dealing area damage.

abilities.name: Grappling Hook
abilities.details: Fires a grappling hook, quickly pulling himself to the target location.

abilities.name: Metal Shield
abilities.details: Uses his bionic arm to block incoming projectiles and attacks from the front for a short duration.

ultimate.name: Cybernetic Sharpshooter
ultimate.effect: Locks onto a target after a brief charge, firing a high-caliber round from his bionic arm for massive damage.
ultimate.details: Activates his arm's hidden capabilities for a devastating sniper shot.

passives.name: Stalker
passives.details: Briefly becomes invisible after using Grappling Hook.

passives.name: Headstrong
passives.details: Precision Rifle deals increased headshot damage.

teamups.effect: Using Metal Shield near Captain America grants both a temporary damage resistance buff.
Enemies damaged by Underslung Grenade are briefly revealed to Black Widow.

lore: James Buchanan 'Bucky' Barnes, Captain America's former sidekick during WWII. Captured and brainwashed by Hydra, he became the deadly assassin known as the Winter Soldier. Now free from his programming, he fights for redemption, utilizing his expert marksmanship, combat skills, and advanced bionic arm.
